description.english: Fire a player.
description.greek: Απολύστε έναν παίκτη.

description.english: Coach three players retiring during the year.

description.german: Coache in einer Saison 3 Spieler, die in Rente gehen.

description.spanish: Entrena a tres jugadores que se retirarán al acabar la temporada.

description.english: Change your team logo for the first time.

description.turkish: Takım logosunu ilk defa değiştir.

description.english: Win 15 games in a row in the same competition.
description.greek: Κερδίστε 15 παιχνίδια στη σειρά στην ίδια διοργάνωση.
description.german: Gewinne 15 Spiele hintereinander im selben Wettbewerb.

description.tchinese: 在同一場比賽連續取得15個勝利.

description.tchinese: 培訓一個月度最佳年輕球員.
